message.body: Hey Julia, it's Ariel. How's Andy doing?!?
Hey! I've ridden him twice more & he was good once and sort of naughty the other time :) it's been wet so it's tough to do too much. Hope Boston's good!
Fussing when I put my leg on, bulging toward the gate, "I don't wanna!" type stuff :) did a lot of transitions & he accepted his fate!
Good! I'm so glad. Sorry he was being funky!
I think he is still making sure I'm worthy of respect! Smart pony.
:) well he's in good hands. How's your hunt for your own horse?
Slow! I have a couple eventers to ride too in the meantime, but it's a process, I guess.
Dang it well hopefully you find one soon
Yup! Do you have something to ride in Boston?
Not yet. I'm trying to find a horse but after Andy and being at their farm, I'm not sure I'll find something as good
I am sure you will find something! Lots of people would be thrilled to have a responsible experienced rider.
Aw thanks! I hope to find something his size. I love that dang horse
